dmca.title: Google DMCA - Richard Salomon
dmca.body:
September 12, 2006     1:35 AM (California Time)
 
Subject: Signature on File
 
From: Jim Salomon (email: jim@jimsalomon.cz)
          C/o Joseph P. Costa (SBN: 1303131) and Darius Anthony Vosylius (SBN: 175030)
          COSTA, ABRAMS, and COATE, LLP
          1221 Second Street, Third Floor
          Santa Monica, CA 90401
          (310) 576-6161
 
To: Mr. Alex Macgillivray
       Intellectual Property Counsel
       Google, Inc.
   Attn: Google Legal Support, Copyright Complaints
       1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
       Mountain View, CA 94043
 
Re: Salomon v. Net Management Services, et al./Copyright Violations
       United States District Court, Central District of California
       Case No. CV 04-1553
 
       Salomon v. LFP Broadcasting, et al./Copyright Violations
       United States District Court, Central District of California
       Case No. CV 05-8603
 
       XPays v. Internet Commerce, et al./Copyright Violations
       United States District Court, Central District of California
       Case No. CV 06-5688
 
 

Dear Alex:
 

This is a Signature on File follow up to: the Paul S. Berra, Esq. of Lavely & Singer letter to you of March 16, 2004 (in numerous prior emails to you, I
